DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . This trial aim evaluate glycaemic control , measure glycosylated haemoglobin ( Hb1Ac ) , daily insulin detemir add-on oral antidiabetic drug ( OAD ) subject type 2 diabetes mellitus Korea .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Glycaemic Control With Insulin Detemir add-on Current Oral Anti-diabetic Drug Treatment Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Korea
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes ( diagnosed 12 month ago ) HbA1c great 7.0 less 12.0 % screen Currently OAD 3 month ago BMI ( Body Mass Index ) less 35kg/m2 Previous treatment insulin 7 day within last 3 month Uncontrolled treated/untreated hypertension ( systolic blood pressure great 180mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure le 110mmHg )
